conversation_message.subject: Urgent Hotel Booking Change Needed
conversation_message.body: Due to a sudden change in plans, I need to adjust my hotel booking dates for my upcoming trip to Paris. Can this be arranged quickly?

parts.body: Hi Emily, we're on it. I'm currently reviewing available options to accommodate your new dates. I'll update you within the next 24 hours.

conversation_message.subject: Last-minute Flight Cancellation Policy
conversation_message.body: What's the policy for last-minute flight cancellations? I might need to cancel my flight due to personal reasons.

parts.body: Hello Derek, I understand your concern. I'm here to help you through the cancellation process and will provide details on policies and potential refunds.
